title: Interpretation of a dream about digging a grave

preview.html: And seeing that the dreamer dug a grave for himself, this indicates building a house for himself, and the dreamer who sees a grave without a funeral in a dream indicates buying a new, spacious and large house in his life. Interpretation of seeing a grave in a dream for a single girlIf an unmarried woman sees in a dream that she is digging a grave. She did not He sees someone's funeral in a dream, but he was happy to dig the grave in the dream. The meaning here indicates that the unmarried girl will buy her a new house. And she will live there many happy and good days in her life. And if the unmarried girl sees in a dream that she sees her father digging many... The graves in the dream were on the surface of the earth. The meaning indicates that the dreamer will live in a new life full of prosperity and beauty. She will live in peace most of her life. As for the unmarried girl who dreams that she saw many people digging her grave in a dream and watched them from afar. The meaning here indicates that in This time, the unmarried girl will be introduced by many young men. And you will see many homes dedicated to him, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of seeing a grave in a dream in detail. Interpretation of seeing a dug grave in a dream for a married woman. It explains that a married woman dreams that her husband asks her to help dig his grave. In a dream. The meaning indicates the presence of goodness, food, and a new life that must be enjoyed. This married woman and her husband, God willing, in their lives during this time. Seeing the dreamer getting married in a dream is that he is watching the digging of a grave with many people in the dream and rejoicing. This indicates the existence of a marriage. Or a marriage that takes place in the life of a woman who is married to one of her children or someone close to her, and God knows best. As for the married dreamer who sees in the dream that she was looking at many graves and digging them all in the dream. The meaning here is that this married dreamer will buy many new homes in her life. You will own it and live in it happily, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a dug grave in a dream for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman dreams that she is digging a grave in the dream and it was on the roof and she was very slow in the dream. It explains that there is a new and beautiful place in which this divorced woman lives during this time. He will be happy in Her life, God willing. Or seeing a divorced woman in a dream that she was looking at the grave. He wanted to dig her out, but he could not. The meaning indicates that there is something on her mind at this time in her life. And you cannot get rid of it during this time. Likewise, seeing in a dream a divorced woman. She dreams that she was digging a grave in a dream. But he did not see anyone’s funeral in the dream and was in a hurry. The interpretation indicates that this divorced woman will make an important decision in her life in a very short time. It will be related to buying, selling or renting some house at the present time. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about walking among graves for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing a dug grave in a dream for a man and its meaning. Likewise, the dreamer who dreams that he is digging a grave for someone he does not know, so he listens to his words and digs deep. The meaning indicates that the man who dreams will live in a very beautiful place during this time. .It could be at work or traveling

title: Learn about the interpretation of digging in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Digging in a dream. Digging in a dream is one of those dreams that tells the dreamer many things related to his life in general, whether good or poetic, and this is according to the signs that appeared in the dream. Digging in a dream. Seeing holes in a dream is a bad deed, it is evidence of deception and cunning. And unwanted things and symbolize a series of bad interpretations, such as an attempt by those around the fortuneteller to deceive him and harm him. If digging leads to the appearance of water in a dream, it is a good omen that removes worries and removes difficult problems that stand in the way of the dreamer’s life in general. When the dreamer constantly digs without It stops during the dream and does not achieve anything, this means that the person is exposed to many useless arguments and the dreamer will fall into many crises without needing them, and God knows best. Also, digging in the dream indicates that there are many undesirable things that will happen soon in the life of the fortuneteller, He must be careful and patient with sadness until he gets rid of those obstacles that have appeared in his life. To interpret your dream accurately and quickly, search for the site Google the Dream Interpretation Secrets. Digging into the dream by Ibn Sirin. Imam Ibn Sirin believes that seeing misery in a dream is a bad thing, and it symbolizes many things. The dreamer may be exposed to it in reality. If the dreamer becomes ill and sees in his dream that he is digging a large hole, this means that the illness may become more severe on him and make him more tired, so he must follow the doctors’ instructions, and be careful to stay in bed. Briefly. If the fortuneteller will travel soon and sees in a dream that he is digging a hole, this means that the fortuneteller will earn a lot of money in the coming period and appreciate the dirt he dug from the hole in the dream. In case the dreamer sees someone he knows digging a hole and forcing him to do so, this means that The dreamer will face a big problem from that person and a number of new things will happen to him because of him. He must get rid of this person because he is evil and the dreamer does not intend any good by him. If a person sees himself eating from the dirt of the hole he dug, it is interpreted that the dreamer will gain money according to what he ate from that dirt, and God knows best. Digging in a dream for a single woman in case the dreamer sees in Dreaming that he was digging a hole, it means that he will get a lot of good things in reality and that he will get very good things in the coming period. When the dreamer dreams that she is digging with a young man she knows, it means that this young man wants to marry her soon. If a girl digs a hole In a dream and she sees that she wants to enter it, this indicates that she is an obedient person and loves to approach God in various ways and seeks Him, and God Almighty helps her to approach Him and do it. Good behavior. If the fortuneteller saw that she was digging a big hole, but she was happy with it and wanted to continue digging, this indicates that she will reach her goal in life and that she is trying to build her future and strives hard to reach it. Dreams that he wanted before. Digging in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees that she is digging a hole in a dream, removing the dirt from it and preparing it well for sitting

title: Interpretation of an earthquake in a dream by Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Here is the interpretation of an earthquake in a dream and its meaning in different situations. An earthquake is one of the natural disasters that causes the destruction of homes and various facilities and occurs as a result of a series of vibrations on the surface of the earth. Earth, which is one of the incidents that causes panic, fear and panic to people because it can also lead to the death of a person under the rubble. Therefore, it is a frightening and unpleasant dream for the pioneer and indicates that something disastrous will happen to him, but interpretation scholars such as Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen mentioned many different interpretations. For this dream, which we will discuss for you in the encyclopedia so that you know its consequences, whether for a man, a single woman, a married woman, or a pregnant woman. Interpretation of an earthquake in a dream. Interpretation of seeing an earthquake in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing an earthquake in a dream as causing destruction and resulting in the survival of many people is a sign of a calamity that befalls Many people, and God knows best. A dream about homes being destroyed as a result of an earthquake indicates something unpleasant, and it may indicate the death of someone close to the dreamer, whether a relative or a friend. If a person sees in his dream a great earthquake that destroyed a specific area, then this dream shows God's punishment for the people of that region because of their actions, and God knows best. Seeing the ground shaking under the dreamer's feet means that he is sad to hear bad news. Interpretation of a dream about an earthquake in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen interpreted seeing an earthquake in general as one of the hateful visions that indicate fear and inability to Making a decision. In the case of surviving an earthquake in a dream, this vision indicates the ability to overcome many difficulties, as well as the dreamer’s determination and ability to face many crises. If the dreamer sees an earthquake that led to the demolition of many homes, then this vision is repulsive and indicates the emergence of discord. And calamity. If the dreamer sees that the earthquake caused complete destruction of his house, then this vision indicates that things will change, either for the better or for the worse. If you see houses collapsing and disappearing underground, then this vision indicates how bad the psychological state of the viewer is and that he is exposed to many pressures. If the dreamer sees that the ground is shaking violently under his feet, then this vision symbolizes recklessness and impulsiveness in decision-making in reality, and this vision indicates the emergence of family problems. Interpretation of an earthquake in a dream for a single woman. Dream interpretation scholars stated that seeing an earthquake in general for an unmarried woman indicates To her exposure to many problems and the extent of her fear of the future, it also indicates a loss of a sense of security. If a single woman sees that her house has been destroyed as a result of the earthquake, this vision indicates that she has made a decision that will cause her many problems, and God knows best. Seeing surviving the earthquake in a dream for a woman For a single woman, it means that she will be able to overcome some difficulties in reality, and God knows best. Seeing an earthquake in a dream for a married woman. In the case of a married woman, seeing this dream in general means that she is facing family problems in reality, and God knows best. Seeing the earth parting and fire or smoke It escalates as a result

title: Interpretation of a dream about a beetle by Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a beetle in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi, as seeing this animal in a dream is considered one of the visions that cause anxiety and fear in the dreamer’s soul, and which carries many different meanings, and an indication of hostility and relationship. Bad guys in most cases, but in the case where we see a beetle. A red beetle in a dream. This dream is evidence of good luck, benefit to the worker, and other indicators that vary depending on the state of the fortuneteller. In this context, we explain to you the interpretation of a dream of a beetle in a dream by Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of a dream of a beetle in a dream by Ibn Sirin. According to what Sheikh Ibn Shirin said, seeing a beetle In a dream, it can be a sign of a severe enemy and harm. Interpretation of a dream about a beetle in a dream by Ibn Sirinho also: Seeing a beetle in a dream is a sign of a bad-tempered woman. Whereas if one collides with a beetle in a dream, a woman with a bad nature will harm him. Also, Seeing this animal in a dream is a symbol of a talkative woman who requires a lot of demands and perseverance. Also, beetles in a dream are a symbol of betrayal and its punishment. If one sees a beetle in his dream on his clothes or body, this indicates his remorse. This happens because of betrayal or disagreement in a promise. And abandoning the covenant. Also, beetles in a dream are evidence of obscene speech, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. See also: Interpretation of a dream about gold in a dream in detail by the most famous interpreters. Interpretation of a beetle in a dream for a single woman, especially since seeing this animal in a woman’s dream has many different interpretations and connotations. As it could be evidence of the old woman’s injury or envy and other indicators that may not be good, and here we learn about the interpretation of a beetle in a dream for a single woman. It is also: If an unmarried woman sees in a dream a black beetle on her body. This vision is evidence of this girl’s exposure. To lie and that she hears bad news. In addition, seeing a black beetle in a dream. It is evidence of a cunning friend who turns into an enemy if the interest is in her favor. Beetles in an unmarried girl’s dream are evidence of a disagreement in a promise and a lie in commandments. A beetle bite in a dream for a girl Unmarried is a sign of a friend who exposes her, who exposes her friend, and also causes her problems, and God is Great and knows this. If a married woman sees in a dream that a beetle is flying and flying around her. This indicates that there are problems and problems that you can follow wherever you go and it will be difficult to get rid of them. See also: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the dream of courtship in a dream and its repercussions. Interpretation of seeing a black beetle in a dream for a man, as this vision in a man’s dream carries many different interpretations based on what the person sees in the dream with different details, such as eating this insect, it shows that something will come to him. Soon, and this vision is a warning not to fall into it. In this context, we explain to you the interpretation of seeing a black beetle in a dream for a man: If a man dreams that he is eating a beetle, it is delicious. It is predicted that something good will come to him.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a person combing my hair for a single woman and its most important meanings

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about someone combing my hair for a single woman An unmarried woman may see in her dream that someone is combing her hair, and the scholar Ibn Sirin considered this vision a good vision, especially if the unmarried woman’s hair is soft, and curly hair in the unmarried woman’s dream is not popular among her scholars and may threaten her with academic failure or emotional failure. And we will review the lines of our article to show anything related to the interpretation of a dream of someone combing my hair for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream of Ibn Sirin’s hairstyle Combing hair in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin, is one of the commendable dreams, especially for unmarried women, as it means her marriage. Short hair in a dream means obtaining a high position. Also, a short hairstyle shows rich knowledge. If the dreamer sees that someone is combing his hair and it shows a lot of curls, this means that there are obstacles in the dreamer’s way. If the dreamer sees that he is combing his hair and it is wooden, this means his absolute belief in envy. The dreamer’s vision that a dead man is combing his hair means a lot of sustenance and many good things for the dreamer. While the dreamer sees that someone gives him a comb as a gift and it is made of silver, this is an indication that he will get money. Whoever sees in his dream that he is giving his wife a wooden comb, this means that the woman will soon become pregnant. If a married woman dreams that she is combing the hair of one of her children, this means the comfort that she will enjoy in the coming period of her life. See also: Interpretation of a dream of marriage from Christian in a dream Interpretation of seeing a hair comb in a dream There are different interpretations of seeing a comb in a dream, as it differs according to the material from which the comb is made, in addition to the color of the comb that has a meaning in the dream, and in the following paragraph I will present to you the interpretation of seeing a hair comb in a dream: As commentators say, the silver comb is a sign that the person makes new friends. This also means that the dreamer will benefit from his friends. If the comb in the dream is made of gold, this means the high status enjoyed by the dreamer. In addition, the golden comb in a person's dream means that he will marry soon. While if the comb is made of plastic, it means success and luck, but also high grades. If an unmarried woman sees that she is combing her hair with a metal comb, this means that a man is trying to get close to her. This also means that he should pay attention to this person. The golden comb in a married woman's dream is a sign of her blessing with a male child. While the wooden comb in a married woman's dream means that she will give birth to a girl, and God knows best. Dreaming of an iron comb for a married woman means that there are problems between her and her family or one of Her relatives. Interpretation of a dream about someone combing my hair in a dream about a single girl by Ibn Sirin An unmarried girl who has never been married before If she dreams that someone she does not know is combing her hair and her hair is fine in a dream for an unmarried girl by Ibn Sirin: Seeing an unmarried woman combing her hair with a wooden comb indicates that there is a good friend she will meet soon. And the thing is

An unmarried girl who did not She has been married before if she dreams that someone she does not know is combing her hair and her hair is fine in the dream. title: Interpretation of a dream about collecting snails in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a snail gathering in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin says that a vision of a snail gathering in a dream may indicate the collapse of the dreamer’s problems in his next life. This vision also indicates the many sins and disobedience that the dreamer commits and then repents. It also indicates faith in God Almighty, and God knows best. Also, seeing snails gathering in a dream may indicate the dreamer’s strong desire to play and have fun and that he is a person who likes to joke a lot and does not like sadness. Interpretation of seeing snails gathering in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream a vision of collecting snails, this indicates the disappearance of her worries and sorrows and abundance. Happiness that passes through her life. Seeing yourself collecting snails in a dream may indicate that you are doing good and righteous deeds, giving alms and adhering to religion, and God knows best. Also, seeing a snail being picked in a dream could mean that an unmarried girl will enter into a new relationship that will end in a good marriage. And God knows best. When an unmarried girl dreams that she is collecting shells with a stranger she does not know, this indicates the failure of her next life. Interpretation of a dream of collecting shells for a married woman: If a married woman sees in her dream a vision of collecting shells, this indicates the collapse of her worries and the abundance of happiness and good news, and God knows best. It can also refer to a vision. Catching a snail in a dream indicates the happiness that a person enjoys and does good deeds, and God knows best. Also, seeing picking snails in a dream may indicate an act of happiness that makes others happy, and recovery from any disease, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about collecting snails for a pregnant woman, if the woman sees A pregnant woman in her dream collects snails, as this indicates the ease of her upcoming birth and facilitating it in the most beautiful way. This vision can also indicate the disappearance of the pain that the pregnant woman feels during pregnancy and childbirth, and it also indicates the birth of a healthy child. Interpretation of a dream about collecting snails for a man. If a gentle man dreams of seeing A snail collects snails, as this indicates the presence of the fortuneteller’s enemies, so he exposes them and gets rid of them. Also, seeing a snail collecting snails in a dream may indicate to a married man the death of his upcoming worries and sorrows, as well as the end of marital disputes. Also, seeing a snail collecting a snail in a dream may indicate happiness and good news. Pleasant and doing good deeds can also refer to good deeds. Seeing collecting snails in a dream may indicate that a man is entering a new business as well as his close marriage to a good girl, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing many snails in a dream Seeing many snails in a dream is one of Dreams that indicate that the dreamer will go through a stage full of happiness and pleasure in his life. Also, seeing a snail walking over a snail and breaking it or killing it in a dream is one of the visions that indicate the dreamer’s connection to some weak people. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and it will A team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: Learn about the interpretation of a burning house in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Burning a house in a dream. Fire is one of the annoying things that can happen suddenly and without warning as a result of a certain mistake committed by someone. When the dreamer sees in his dream that his house is burning inside him, he becomes afraid and may be terrified by seeing it. . He is in a hurry to find out the interpretation of this vision, and interpretation scholars say that seeing a fire in the house carries many connotations, and in this article we consider together the most important things that the interpreters said about this dream. A burning house in a dream. Scientists say that the interpretation of a dream about a burning house for the dreamer indicates exposure. To serious conflicts in real life. Burning a house in a dream indicates the many changes that the dreamer will see, whether emotionally, socially, or practically. Also, seeing a fire in the house in a dream means being exposed to a major disaster or a serious ordeal for all family members. And when the dreamer sees in a dream that His house is burning, this indicates that it is a warning that he will give up bad deeds because they will expose him to problems. And if the dreamer sees that his house is burning, this means that he must get rid of all the bad things that he does. And the dreamer who sees in a dream a fire in her house indicates the outbreak of disputes and conflicts. Among family members.Secrets of Dream InterpretationThe expert includes a team of the best interpreters of dreams and visions in the country. The website is in Arabic. To access it, type a page on the Internet Secrets of Dream Interpretation on Google. A burning house in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a fire burning a house means that the dreamer is committing an immoral act and must repent. Also, seeing in a dream that his house is burning indicates his involvement in some problems and may end up with him. The matter is in prison. When the dreamer sees in his dream that his house is burning, this indicates a disaster or a great calamity. Seeing a fire burning with flames and a loud sound in the dream means that he will be exposed to great problems and temptations. And if the woman sees that the house is burning in the dream, and the winds come and increase it, then this It indicates that the people of the house are being robbed, and God knows best. A burning house in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that her house is burning, this means that the house will be exposed to many temptations or perhaps someone will become seriously ill. And when the dreamer sees burning fires in the house This leads to damage to his limbs and damage to them, or perhaps to exacerbation of problems. And if the dreamer sees that she set fire to her house, this symbolizes that she loves to learn about different cultures and loves to guide everyone to goodness. And if the fortune-teller saw in a dream that her house was burning On the ground and touching her body and burning it, these are bad visions and she must repent and return to God. If a religious woman who follows her religion sees her house burning in a dream, this means that she will be exposed to some misfortunes and trials and she must be patient. And when the dreamer sees that the furniture of the house has been completely burned in the dream, This means that the family will be exposed to difficult financial difficulties. A burning house in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in the dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about washing the face in a dream and its consequences

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about washing the face in a dream: Washing the face can be considered necessary and maintained, as a person enjoys glasses and gets rid of impurities that can harm the face or affect it negatively. Based on the above, each individual must have his own daily routine and skin type to maintain it. It protects it, and each skin type has its own routine. Interpretation of the dream of washing the face in a dream. There are different types of skin and each type has the appropriate preparation to protect it from the dirt and pollutants that the person is exposed to throughout his day, and in the day he must wash it at least twice. And the dream of washing the face in a dream. It may indicate : -It is one of the signs that prove the servant’s closeness to his Lord, his relationship with Him, and his piety. While washing the face in a dream, it can be considered one of the signs that circumstances will change for the better for the dreamer. However, when a married woman is seen washing her face, this is evidence of goodness and blessing in life. Its coming days. If the fortuneteller sees that he is washing his face while suffering from accumulated debts, this may indicate that he will pay this debt. While the seer is washing his face with hot water, this can be considered a sign of worry and anxiety that awaits the dreamer. As well as washing the face with blood is a sign of fear Who controls the life of the fortuneteller. He came up with an interpretation of washing the face with cold water, which is one of the signs of piety and piety that the dreamer distinguishes. While Ibn Sirin interpreted that washing the face in a dream is evidence of the purity and purity of the dreamer’s heart. It is worth noting that the foam that comes out of the soap when washing is evidence of it. On abundant food for the fortuneteller. Many interpreters interpreted washing the face as a sign that God will forgive the sins of the dreamer. See also: Interpretation of dreams about crossing a busy road and its consequences. Washing the face with soap in a dream for a divorced woman. The face can be washed with water and soap to clean it properly, get rid of the dirt stuck on it, and protect it from Damage while washing the face with soap in a dream for a divorced woman may indicate: - It can be considered a sign of absolute wealth and goodness that she will acquire in the coming days. It is also a sign that this woman will begin a new life full of happiness, and God knows best. She is one of the people who ends up with many... Problems and fears in her coming life. It should be noted that they are signs that God Almighty will facilitate many things for her in the coming days. See also: Interpretation of a dream about the appearance of menstrual blood or the menstrual cycle by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about cleaning the face of makeup. It is necessary to clean the face with makeup properly so that it does not It leads to the closing of the pores of the face and thus the accumulation of many pimples on it, which negatively affects it. Interpretation of a dream about cleaning the face of makeup may indicate: - It can be considered one of the signs of overcoming many problems and difficulties in the life of the fortuneteller. It should be noted that it is one of the dreams that indicate profit. Which the dreamer will receive. It is also a sign of positive changes in the dreamer’s life. It is a sign of human beings to save insight from loss, worries and anguish. It is also a sign of...

title: Interpretation of a dream about blood coming out of the vulva by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about blood coming out of the vagina It is one of the dreams that disturbs women, but most interpreters have confirmed that the vision, even if it is disturbing and brings crises to the dreamer and those around her, there are some cases in which it brings goodness, livelihood and happiness. Interpretation of a dream of blood coming out of the vagina The blood that comes out of the vagina in a dream indicates To commit sins and acts immoral, while the interpretation of a dream about blood coming out of the vagina and trying to clean or remove it indicates an attempt to purify or get rid of those acts permanently. Or entering the house with illegal money while blood is spilled in a single person’s dream means marriage soon. It occurs in the sight and hearing of the dreamer without objection, so the vision warns, as the foul smell indicates the discovery of the matter. Interpretation of a dream of blood coming out of the vulva by Ibn SirinInterpretations of Ibn Sirin have many different viewpoints of the vision that depend on the divine narration, as the interpretation of the dream of blood coming out of the vulva Ibn Sirin's vagina is good for a woman who lives in a bad psychological state. The skin is used to relieve anxiety, end anxiety, and get rid of everything that bothers her in life, while blood comes with a feeling of some pain, as it is an indication that she is going through a small health crisis, but bleeding indicates recovery. Interpretation of a dream about blood coming out of the Gulf according to Al-Nabulsi: Imam Al-Nabulsi says that blood coming out of the vulva of a married pregnant woman is a sign of a difficult period of pregnancy and a natural birth without surgery, while the interpretation of a dream about blood coming out of the vagina according to Al-Nabulsi is for these people. Whoever suffers from disagreements or crises is an indication of this woman’s suffering in life, as the vision deeply reflects her psychological state, as Al-Nabulsi says that the vision symbolizes bearing a great responsibility without anyone’s help, while heavy blood in a married woman’s dream, in his view, symbolizes a lot for her. Of lying to her husband, which causes her many problems. Interpretation of a dream of blood coming out of the vagina for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream of bleeding from a virgin’s vagina suddenly is a happy dream, as this indicates the intrusion of joy into her life on the professional or academic level, and in the event that she is delayed in marriage, the vision becomes good skin. That she will get married soon, while the blood spreading from her to the place around her, along with her feeling of fear or anxiety, is an indication of marriage against her will, and the vision reflects the sadness, anxiety, and coercion that she feels from her guardian. Interpretation of a dream of blood coming out of the vagina for a virgin: Pieces of blood falling from a virgin in a dream without her regretting it Or she is ashamed of bad dreams, as it indicates the presence of bad friends in her life who follow her without thinking about it, causing her harm, while interpreting the dream. Pieces of blood that come out of the vagina for a virgin and getting rid of them is a sign of re-maturity and realizing past mistakes and getting rid of them wisely. Interpretation of a dream of menstrual blood coming out of the vagina for a virgin. Jurists pointed out that the interpretation of a dream of menstrual blood coming out of a virgin’s vagina rarely has a special interpretation or meaning, but it often It is the result of psychological stress that occurs several days before the menstrual period. Obsessions that have no explanation, in between
